title: ApplicationData isn't removed after uninstall windows phone 8
body:
I've developed application which targets Windows Phone 8.0. When XAP is deployed on Win10 Mobile device it has some strange bug.
After re-installing the app (uninstall - deploy) Application's Data stays the same - it isn't removed after unstalling the app.
But when I retarget the app to Windows Pone 8.1 problem disappears.
Could you please investigate that?

comments.body:
As Application's data I use - ApplicationSettings and SQLite DB with path
Path.Combine(ApplicationData.Current.LocalFolder.Path, "LOCAL_DB")
